h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: Be sure to travel back to the Crouching Tiger Temple entrance next, and look for him near the top of the stairs to the right — opposite where the Meditation Spot is. He’ll be resting against the far wall, and complaining about the meat. What he really wants now is some Jade Lotus. You should already have plenty of that stored away, but if not, you can easily find some in most pools of water, especially the large pool where you first entered the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to travel back to the Crouching Tiger Temple entrance next, and look for him near the top of the stairs to the right — opposite where the Meditation Spot is. He’ll be resting against the far wall, and complaining about the meat. What he really wants now is some Jade Lotus. You should already have plenty of that stored away, but if not, you can easily find some in most pools of water, especially the large pool where you first entered the chapter.
